about.title: Skyline - Mental Model Diagram Generator
about.addText1: Skyline is a tool for generating Mental Model Diagrams, visualizing how users think and behave, inspired by Indi Young's methodology.
about.addText2: A Mental Model Diagram attempts to capture and visualize a summarized version of the mental models of a certain group of people to provide insight into their thinking patterns.
about.addText3: In a business case, it is used to align the users' expectations with the product that is being developed.
about.linktoIndiYoung: For further information and reading into Indi Young's work go to:
